data.title: Zurich Weather Forecast
data.meta_description: Get the latest weather forecast in Zurich, Switzerland for today, tomorrow, long range weather and the next 14 days, with accurate temperature, feels like and humidity levels.
data.text:
Best months to visit Zurich?

May and June are the best month to go for holiday or travel to Zurich forecast these months temperature to be around 18°c and average of 156.3125 hours of sunshine in a month.

Coldest months of Zurich?

January and February are the coldest months with temperature at around -2°c.

Which months receive most rainfall in Zurich?

May and June receive most rainfall with precipitation count of 130.07mm.

Travelling to Zurich? Check out our Weather averages of Zurich to better plan your holiday or travel.

If you would just like to know what the weather was for a past dates for research or education or you are just curious then visit our historical weather of Zurich section.

Zurich Holiday Weather Overview

Zurich is the largest city in Switzerland and has a reputation to match. Long known as the financial hub of Switzerland and boasting the world’s fourth biggest stock exchange, it is becoming quickly a very trend conscious city.

Located next to a picturesque lake and possessing a skyline broken up by church steeples and spectacular mountain scenery, Zurich is an arty and vibrant city.

When is the best month to visit Zurich?

Most tourists decide to visit Zurich in summer. This is because various evening celebrations and parties can take place in the increased daylight hours. As the climate in both September and October remains reasonably warm, this is also a good time to visit the city.

Climate in Zurich

Spring is a fantastic time to visit Zurich. The parks are filled with colourful flowers and the temperatures tend to be between 15°C and 20°C. Night-time temperatures remain cold and the wind often makes daytime temperatures feel much cooler.

Rainfall increases the end of spring yet this period generally remains clear and sunny.

Summer in Zurich

Summer in Zurich lasts approximately from June to September and offers the most enjoyable climate for outdoor pursuits. The average temperatures usually stand between 16°C and 30°C in Zurich in the summer. Surprisingly, as well as the sun summer tends to bring the most rain. Nevertheless, it is the best season for outdoor activities in Zurich.

Autumn in Zurich

Autumn comes in early September and lasts till mid-October. It comes early in the mountains and offers a very comfortable climate for the tourists. Autumn months witness the highest rainfall of the year but downpours are usually short

Winter in Zurich

The winter weather in Zurich is cold and snowy; the average maximum temperatures stand just above 0°C. The coldest month is January when the temperature ranges between -10°C and 5°C. Snow can occur at this time of the year, while the climate soon begins to warm up and reaches as high as 8°C or more by the time March arrives.

What to pack and wear in Zurich?

As the winter in Zurich is cold and often snowy, if you are travelling during this period you should dress to combat the cold. Bring warm clothing such as coat, hat, scarf, gloves and boots. If you are planning on going skiing, check whether the resort rents out the relevant equipment.

Remember rain showers can be expected in the summer, so prepare for any sudden bursts of rain with an umbrella or raincoat. Shorts and t-shirts are suitable for the summer heat. The lake provides the perfect swimming opportunities, so don’t forget bathing clothes!

The restaurants and nightlife can be quite sophisticated so feel free to dress to impress!
